“ Oh yes , ”[144-fred] said [Fred]144-fred , smirking . “ [This little beauty]3308-this little beauty ’s taught [us]3304-we more than [all the teachers in [this school]3024-this school]3309-all the teachers in this school . ”[144-fred]

“ [You]117-harry ’re winding [me]117-harry up , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , looking at the ragged old bit of parchment .

“ Oh , are [we]3304-we ? ”[145-george] said [George]145-george .

[He]1526-i took out [his]1526-i wand , touched the parchment lightly , and said , “ [I]1526-i solemnly swear that [I]1526-i am up to no good . ”[1526-i]

And at once , thin ink lines began to spread like a spider ’s web from the point that [George]145-george ’s wand had touched . [They]1527-they joined each other , [they]1527-they crisscrossed , [they]1527-they fanned into every corner of the parchment ; then words began to blossom across the top , great , curly green words , that proclaimed :

Messrs. Moony , Wormtail , Padfoot , and Prongs , Purveyors of Aids to Magical Mischief - Makersare , proud to present [THE MARAUDER]281-the marauder ’S MAP .

It was a map showing every detail of [the Hogwarts castle]1528-the hogwarts castle and grounds . But the truly remarkable thing were the tiny ink dots moving around it , each labeled with a name in minuscule writing . Astounded , [Harry]117-harry bent over it . A labeled dot in the top left corner showed that [Professor Dumbledore]210-dumbledore was pacing [[his]210-dumbledore study]1529-his study ; [the caretaker]1303-the caretaker ’s cat , [Mrs. Norris]282-mrs. norris , was prowling [the second floor]3211-the second floor ; and [Peeves]239-peeves [the Poltergeist]1350-the poltergeist was currently bouncing around [the trophy room]1533-the trophy room . And as [Harry]117-harry ’s eyes traveled up and down [the familiar corridors]1534-the familiar corridors , [he]117-harry noticed something else .

This map showed [a set of passages [he]117-harry had never entered]1535-a set of passages he had never entered . And many of them seemed to lead —

“ Right into [Hogsmeade]16-hogsmeade , ”[144-fred] said [Fred]144-fred , tracing one of them with [his]144-fred finger . “ There are seven in all . “ [Moony]283-moony , [Wormtail]284-wormtail , [Padfoot]285-padfoot , and Prongs , ”[145-george] sighed [George]145-george , patting the heading of the map . “ [We]3311-we owe [them]3319-them so much . ”[145-george]

“ [Noble men , working tirelessly to help [a new generation of [lawbreakers]3322-lawbreakers]3321-a new generation of lawbreakers]3320-noble men , working tirelessly to help a new generation of lawbreakers , ”[144-fred] said [Fred]144-fred solemnly .

“ Right , ”[145-george] said [George]145-george briskly . “ Do n’t forget to wipe it after [you]3316-you ’ve used it — ”[145-george]

“ Just tap it again and say , ‘ Mischief managed ! ’ And it ’ll go blank . ”[145-george]

“ So , [young Harry]117-harry , ”[144-fred] said [Fred]144-fred , in an uncanny impersonation of [Percy]143-percy , “ mind [you]117-harry behave [yourself]117-harry . ”[144-fred]

“ See [you]117-harry in [Honeydukes]49-honeydukes , ”[145-george] said [George]145-george , winking .

[They]1536-they left [the room]404-the room , both smirking in a satisfied sort of way .

[Harry]117-harry stood there , gazing at the miraculous map . [He]117-harry watched the tiny ink [Mrs. Norris]282-mrs. norris turn left and pause to sniff at something on the floor . If [Filch]241-filch really did n’t know ... [he]241-filch would n’t have to pass [the dementors]2939-the dementors at all ...

But even as [he]117-harry stood there , flooded with excitement , something [Harry]117-harry had once heard [Mr. Weasley]136-mr. weasley say came floating out of [his]117-harry memory .

Never trust anything that can think for itself , if [you]1539-you ca n’t see where it keeps its brain .

This map was one of those dangerous magical objects [Mr. Weasley]136-mr. weasley had been warning against ... Aids for [Magical Mischief - Makers]1540-magical mischief - makers ... but then , [Harry]117-harry reasoned , [he]117-harry only wanted to use it to get into [Hogsmeade]16-hogsmeade , it was n’t as though [he]117-harry wanted to steal anything or attack [anyone]387-anyone ... and [Fred]144-fred and [George]145-george had been using it for years without anything horrible happening ...

[Harry]117-harry traced [the secret passage]1542-the secret passage to [Honeydukes]49-honeydukes with [his]117-harry finger .

Then , quite suddenly , as though following orders , [he]117-harry rolled up the map , stuffed it inside [his]117-harry robes , and hurried to the door of [the classroom]1041-the classroom . [He]117-harry opened it a couple of inches . There was [no one outside]1544-no one outside . Very carefully , [he]117-harry edged out of [the room]404-the room and behind the statue of [the one - eyed witch]1546-the one - eyed witch .

What did [he]117-harry have to do ? [He]117-harry pulled out the map again and saw , to [his]117-harry astonishment , that a new ink figure had appeared upon it , labeled [Harry Potter]117-harry . [This figure]1547-this figure was standing exactly where [the real Harry]1548-the real harry was standing , about halfway down [the third - floor corridor]1523-the third - floor corridor . [Harry]117-harry watched carefully . [His]117-harry little ink self appeared to be tapping [the witch]742-the witch with [his]117-harry minute wand . [Harry]117-harry quickly took out [his]117-harry real wand and tapped the statue . Nothing happened . [He]117-harry looked back at the map . The tiniest speech bubble had appeared next to [his]117-harry figure . The word inside said , “ Dissendium . ”[117-harry]

“ Dissendium ! ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry whispered , tapping [the stone witch]1551-the stone witch again .

At once , the statue ’s hump opened wide enough to admit [a fairly thin person]1552-a fairly thin person . [Harry]117-harry glanced quickly up and down [the corridor]852-the corridor , then tucked the map away again , hoisted [himself]117-harry into the hole headfirst , and pushed [himself]117-harry forward .

[He]117-harry slid a considerable way down what felt like a stone slide , then landed on cold , damp earth . [He]117-harry stood up , looking around . [It]1554-it was pitch dark . [He]117-harry held up [his]117-harry wand , muttered , “ [Lumos]286-lumos ! ”[117-harry] and saw that [he]117-harry was in [a very narrow , low , earthy passageway]1555-a very narrow , low , earthy passageway . [He]117-harry raised the map , tapped it with the tip of [his]117-harry wand , and muttered , “ Mischief managed ! ”[117-harry] The map went blank at once . [He]117-harry folded it carefully , tucked it inside [his]117-harry robes , then , heart beating fast , both excited and apprehensive , [he]117-harry set off .

[The passage]775-the passage twisted and turned , more like the burrow of a giant rabbit than anything else . [Harry]117-harry hurried along [it]775-the passage , stumbling now and then on the uneven floor , holding [his]117-harry wand out in front of [him]117-harry .

It took ages , but [Harry]117-harry had the thought of [Honeydukes]49-honeydukes to sustain [him]117-harry . After what felt like an hour , [the passage]775-the passage began to rise . Panting , [Harry]117-harry sped up , [his]117-harry face hot , [his]117-harry feet very cold .

Ten minutes later , [he]117-harry came to the foot of some worn stone steps , which rose out of sight above [him]117-harry . Careful not to make any noise , [Harry]117-harry began to climb . A hundred steps , two hundred steps , [he]117-harry lost count as [he]117-harry climbed , watching [his]117-harry feet ... Then , without warning , [his]117-harry head hit something hard .

It seemed to be a trapdoor . [Harry]117-harry stood there , massaging the top of [his]117-harry head , listening . [He]117-harry could n’t hear any sounds above [him]117-harry . Very slowly , [he]117-harry pushed the trapdoor open and peered over the edge .

[He]117-harry was in [a cellar]1558-a cellar , which was full of wooden crates and boxes . [Harry]117-harry climbed out of the trapdoor and replaced it — it blended so perfectly with the dusty floor that it was impossible to tell it was there . [Harry]117-harry crept slowly toward the wooden staircase that led [upstairs]505-upstairs . Now [he]117-harry could definitely hear voices , not to mention the tinkle of a bell and the opening and shutting of a door .

Wondering what [he]117-harry ought to do , [he]117-harry suddenly heard a door open much closer at hand ; [somebody]711-somebody was about to come [downstairs]395-downstairs .

“ And get another box of Jelly Slugs , [dear]2785-dear , [they]3325-they ’ve nearly cleaned [us]3326-us out — ”[1463-a woman] said [a woman]1463-a woman ’s voice .

A pair of feet was coming down the staircase . [Harry]117-harry leapt behind an enormous crate and waited for the footsteps to pass . [He]117-harry heard [the man shifting boxes against the opposite wall]1563-the man shifting boxes against the opposite wall . [He]117-harry might not get another chance —

Quickly and silently , [Harry]117-harry dodged out from [his]117-harry hiding place and climbed [the stairs]1168-the stairs ; looking back , [he]117-harry saw an enormous backside and shiny bald head , buried in a box . [Harry]117-harry reached the door at the top of [the stairs]1168-the stairs , slipped through it , and found [himself]117-harry behind the counter of [Honeydukes]49-honeydukes — [he]117-harry ducked , crept sideways , and then straightened up .

[Honeydukes]49-honeydukes was so crowded with [Hogwarts students]1566-hogwarts students that [no one]2805-no one looked twice at [Harry]117-harry . [He]117-harry edged among [them]1566-hogwarts students , looking around , and suppressed a laugh as [he]117-harry imagined the look that would spread over [Dudley]125-dudley ’s piggy face if [he]117-harry could see where [Harry]117-harry was now .

There were shelves upon shelves of the most succulent - looking sweets imaginable . Creamy chunks of nougat , shimmering pink squares of coconut ice , fat , honey - colored toffees ; hundreds of different kinds of chocolate in neat rows ; there was a large barrel of Every Flavor Beans , and another of Fizzing Whizbees , the levitating sherbet balls that [Ron]147-ron had mentioned ; along yet another wall were “ Special Effects ”[147-ron] sweets : Drooble ’s Best Blowing Gum ( which filled [a room]1568-a room with bluebell - colored bubbles that refused to pop for days ) , the strange , splintery Toothflossing Stringmints , tiny black Pepper Imps ( “ Breathe fire for [[your]117-harry friends]3327-your friends ! ”[147-ron] ) , [Ice Mice]287-ice mice ( “ Hear [your]117-harry teeth chatter and squeak ! ”[287-ice mice] ) , peppermint creams shaped like toads ( “ Hop realistically in the stomach ! ”[287-ice mice] ) , fragile sugar - spun quills , and exploding bonbons .

[Harry]117-harry squeezed [himself]117-harry through [a crowd of sixth years]1569-a crowd of sixth years and saw a sign hanging in the farthest corner of [the shop]684-the shop ( UNUSUAL TASTES ) . [Ron]147-ron and [Hermione]313-hermione were standing underneath [it]1571-it , examining a tray of blood - flavored lollipops . [Harry]117-harry sneaked up behind [them]1572-them .

“ Definitely not , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry .

[Ron]147-ron nearly dropped the jar .

[THE MINISTRY OF MAGIC

“ [Harry]117-harry ? ”[1000-the teachers]

[The dormitory]1419-the dormitory door opened .

“ [Harry]117-harry ? ”[147-ron] said [Ron]147-ron ’s voice uncertainly .

“ Say [You]147-ron - Know - Who , will [you]147-ron ? ”[147-ron] interjected [Ron]147-ron angrily .

“ — so obviously , [the Malfoys]302-the malfoys knew [Black]152-black was working for [Voldemort]133-voldemort — ”[117-harry]

“ Oh , [Harry]117-harry ! Who sent [you]147-ron that ? ”[313-hermione]

“ No idea , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry . “ There was n’t a card or anything with it . ”[117-harry]

To [his]147-ron great surprise , [Hermione]313-hermione did not appear either excited or intrigued by the news . On the contrary , [her]313-hermione face fell , and [she]313-hermione bit [her]313-hermione lip .

“ What ’s the matter with [you]117-harry ? ”[147-ron] said [Ron]147-ron .

“ [I]313-hermione do n’t know , ”[313-hermione] said [Hermione]313-hermione slowly , “ but it ’s a bit odd , is n’t it ? [I]313-hermione mean , this is supposed to be quite a good broom , is n’t it ? ”[313-hermione]

[Ron]147-ron sighed exasperatedly .

“ It ’s the best broom there is , [Hermione]313-hermione , ”[147-ron] [he]147-ron said .

“ So it must ’ve been really expensive ... ”[147-ron]

[Crookshanks]251-crookshanks ’s fur suddenly stood on end . A shrill , tinny whistling was filling [the room]404-the room . The Pocket Sneakoscope had become dislodged from [Uncle Vernon]123-uncle vernon ’s old socks and was whirling and gleaming on the floor .

“ [I]117-harry forgot about that ! ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry said , bending down and picking up the Sneakoscope . “ [I]117-harry never wear those socks if [I]117-harry can help it ... ”[117-harry]

“ [Sirius Black]152-black , ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry said wearily . “ [He]152-black ’s supposed to be after [me]117-harry . So [McGonagall]199-professor mcgonagall reckons [he]152-black might have sent it . ”[117-harry]

[He]117-harry stood up , crammed the last bit of chocolate into [his]117-harry mouth , and headed back to [Gryffindor Tower]56-gryffindor tower .

[Ravenclaw]266-ravenclaw played [Slytherin]209-gryffindor a week after the start of term . [Slytherin]209-gryffindor won , though narrowly . According to [Wood]247-wood , this was good news for [Gryffindor]209-gryffindor , who would take second place if [they]209-gryffindor beat [Ravenclaw]266-ravenclaw too . [He]117-harry therefore increased the number of team practices to five a week . This meant that with [Lupin]195-lupin ’s anti - dementor classes , which in themselves were more draining than six Quidditch practices , [Harry]117-harry had just one night a week to do all [his]117-harry homework . Even so , [he]117-harry was n’t showing the strain nearly as much as [Hermione]313-hermione , whose immense workload finally seemed to be getting to [her]313-hermione . Every night , without fail , [Hermione]313-hermione was to be seen in a corner of [the common room]1008-the common room , several tables spread with books , Arithmancy charts , rune dictionaries , diagrams of Muggles lifting heavy objects , and file upon file of extensive notes ; [she]313-hermione barely spoke to [anybody]1148-anybody and snapped when [she]313-hermione was interrupted .

“ How ’s [she]313-hermione doing it ? ”[147-ron] [Ron]147-ron muttered to [Harry]117-harry one evening as [Harry]117-harry sat finishing a nasty essay on Undetectable Poisons for [Snape]260-snape . “ Doing what ? ”[147-ron]

[Harry]117-harry did n’t have time to fathom the mystery of [Hermione]313-hermione ’s impossible schedule at the moment ; [he]117-harry really needed to get on with [Snape]260-snape ’s essay . Two seconds later , however , [he]117-harry was interrupted again , this time by [Wood]247-wood .

“ Bad news , [Harry]117-harry . [I]247-wood ’ve just been to see [Professor McGonagall]199-professor mcgonagall about the Firebolt . “ [I]117-harry ’m not buying anything [Malfoy]306-malfoy thinks is good , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry flatly .

January faded imperceptibly into February , with no change in the bitterly cold weather . “ [I]117-harry thought [a Patronus]3595-a patronus would — charge [the dementors]2939-the dementors down or something , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry dispiritedly . “ Make [them]2939-the dementors disappear — ”[117-harry]

It looked like the end of [Ron]147-ron and [Hermione]313-hermione ’s friendship . [Each]323-each was so angry with [the other]1787-the other that [Harry]117-harry could n’t see how [they]1788-they ’d ever make up .

[She]270-madam hooch and [Ron]147-ron left [the field]1263-the field to sit in [the stadium]1430-the stadium , and [the Gryffindor team]1387-the gryffindor team gathered around [Wood]247-wood for [his]247-wood final instructions for tomorrow ’s match .

“ [Harry]117-harry , [I]247-wood ’ve just found out who [Ravenclaw]266-ravenclaw is playing as [Seeker]203-seeker . It ’s [Cho Chang]324-cho . [She]3622-she ’s a fourth year , and [she]3622-she ’s pretty good ... [I]247-wood really hoped [she]3622-she would n’t be fit , [she]3622-she ’s had some problems with injuries ... ”[247-wood] [Wood]247-wood scowled [his]247-wood displeasure that [Cho Chang]324-cho had made a full recovery , then said , “ On the other hand , [she]3622-she rides a Comet Two Sixty , which is going to look like a joke next to [the Firebolt]181-the firebolt . ”[247-wood] [He]247-wood gave [Harry]117-harry ’s broom a look of fervent admiration , then said , “ Okay , [everyone]769-everyone , let ’s go — ”[247-wood]

And at long last , [Harry]117-harry mounted [his]117-harry Firebolt , and kicked off from the ground .

It was better than [he]117-harry ’d ever dreamed . The Firebolt turned with the lightest touch ; it seemed to obey [his]117-harry thoughts rather than [his]117-harry grip ; it sped across [the field]1263-the field at such speed that [the stadium]1430-the stadium turned into a green - and - gray blur ; [Harry]117-harry turned it so sharply that [Alicia Spinnet]248-alicia screamed , then [he]117-harry went into a perfectly controlled dive , brushing [the grassy field]1800-the grassy field with [his]117-harry toes before rising thirty , forty , fifty feet into the air again —

“ [Harry]117-harry , [I]247-wood ’m letting the Snitch out ! ”[247-wood] [Wood]247-wood called .

[Harry]117-harry turned and raced a Bludger toward the goalposts ; [he]117-harry outstripped it easily , saw the Snitch dart out from behind [Wood]247-wood , and within ten seconds had caught it tightly in [his]117-harry hand .

[The team]3128-the team cheered madly . [Harry]117-harry let [the Snitch]223-the snitch go again , gave it a minute ’s head start , then tore after [it]223-the snitch , weaving in and out of the others ; [he]117-harry spotted it lurking near [Katie Bell]250-gryffindor ’s knee , looped [her]250-gryffindor easily , and caught it again .

It was the best practice ever ; [the team]3128-the team , inspired by the presence of the Firebolt in [their]3128-the team midst , performed [their]3128-the team best moves faultlessly , and by the time [they]3128-the team hit the ground again , [Wood]247-wood did n’t have a single criticism to make , which , as [George Weasley]145-george pointed out , was a first .

“ [I]247-wood ca n’t see what ’s going to stop [us]3128-the team tomorrow ! ”[247-wood] said [Wood]247-wood . “ Not unless — [Harry]117-harry , [you]117-harry ’ve sorted out [your]117-harry dementor problem , have n’t [you]117-harry ? ”[247-wood]

“ Yeah , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , thinking of [his]117-harry feeble Patronus and wishing it were stronger .

“ [I]117-harry ’m staying out for a bit ; [Ron]147-ron wants a go on [the Firebolt]181-the firebolt , ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry told [Wood]247-wood , and while [the rest of [the team]3128-the team]1391-the rest of the team headed off to [the locker rooms]1805-the locker rooms , [Harry]117-harry strode over to [Ron]147-ron , who vaulted the barrier to [the stands]1455-the stands and came to meet [him]117-harry . [They]1808-they were halfway toward [the castle]807-the castle when [Harry]117-harry , glancing to [his]117-harry left , saw something that made [his]117-harry heart turn over — a pair of eyes , gleaming out of the darkness .

[Harry]117-harry stopped dead , [his]117-harry heart banging against [his]117-harry ribs .

“ Right , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , and feeling happier than [he]117-harry had in ages , [he]117-harry and [the rest of [the team]3128-the team]1391-the rest of the team led the way , still in [their]1871-they scarlet robes , out of [the stadium]1430-the stadium and back up to [the castle]807-the castle .

It felt as though [they]1871-they had already won the Quidditch Cup ; the party went on all day and well into the night . [Fred]144-fred and [George Weasley]145-george disappeared for a couple of hours and returned with armfuls of bottles of butterbeer , pumpkin fizz , and several bags full of Honeydukes sweets .

“ How did [you]117-harry do that ? ”[249-angelina] squealed [Angelina Johnson]249-angelina as [George]145-george started throwing Peppermint Toads into [the crowd]683-the crowd .

“ With a little help from [Moony]283-moony , Wormtail , [Padfoot]285-padfoot , and Prongs , ”[144-fred] [Fred]144-fred muttered in [Harry]117-harry ’s ear .

[Only one person]1882-only one person was n’t joining in the festivities . [Hermione]313-hermione , incredibly , was sitting in a corner , attempting to read an enormous book entitled Home Life and Social Habits of British Muggles . [Harry]117-harry broke away from the table where [Fred]144-fred and [George]145-george had started juggling butterbeer bottles and went over to [her]313-hermione .

“ Did [you]313-hermione even come to the match ? ”[117-harry] [he]117-harry asked [her]313-hermione .

[He]117-harry had a very strange dream . [He]117-harry was walking through [a forest]1886-a forest , [his]117-harry Firebolt over [his]117-harry shoulder , following something silvery - white . “ Well , [Filch]241-filch has n’t done anything about the passage into [Honeydukes]49-honeydukes ... ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry said , even more quietly .

SPLAT .

SPLATTER .

“ [I]117-harry ’ve been up in [Gryffindor Tower]56-gryffindor tower , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry . “ Like [you]260-snape told — ”[117-harry]

“ So , ”[260-snape] [he]260-snape said , straightening up again . “ [Everyone]769-everyone from [the Minister of Magic downward]3683-the minister of magic downward has been trying to keep [famous Harry Potter]117-harry safe from [Sirius Black]152-black . [Harry]117-harry stayed silent . [Snape]260-snape was trying to provoke [him]117-harry into telling the truth . [He]260-snape was n’t going to do it . [Snape]260-snape had no proof — yet .

“ How extraordinarily like [[your]117-harry father]2682-your father [you]117-harry are , [Potter]117-harry , ”[260-snape] [Snape]260-snape said suddenly , [his]260-snape eyes glinting . “ [He]2682-your father too was exceedingly arrogant . “ [[My]117-harry dad]3531-my dad did n’t strut , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , before [he]117-harry could stop [himself]117-harry . “ And neither do [I.]117-harry ”[117-harry]

“ [[Your]117-harry father]2682-your father did n’t set much store by rules either , ”[260-snape] [Snape]260-snape went on , pressing [his]260-snape advantage , [his]260-snape thin face full of malice . “ Rules were for [lesser mortals]3695-lesser mortals , [not Quidditch Cup - winners]3696-not quidditch cup - winners . “ SHUT UP ! ”[260-snape]

[Harry]117-harry was suddenly on [his]117-harry feet . Rage such as [he]117-harry had not felt since [his]117-harry last night in [Privet Drive]1-privet drive was coursing through [him]117-harry . [He]117-harry did n’t care that [Snape]260-snape ’s face had gone rigid , the black eyes flashing dangerously .

“ What did [you]260-snape say to [me]260-snape , [Potter]117-harry ? ”[260-snape]

[Harry]117-harry bit [his]117-harry lip . [He]117-harry did n’t know what had happened and did n’t want to admit it — but [Snape]260-snape seemed to have guessed the truth .

“ [She]313-hermione could ’ve done with a Cheering Charm on [her]313-hermione too , ”[147-ron] said [Ron]147-ron as [the class]1047-the class left for lunch , all grinning broadly — the Cheering Charms had left [them]1047-the class with a feeling of great contentment .

[Hermione]313-hermione was n’t at lunch either . By the time [they]1047-the class had finished [their]1047-the class apple pie , the after - effects of the Cheering Charms were wearing off , and [Harry]117-harry and [Ron]147-ron had started to get slightly worried .

The Easter holidays were not exactly relaxing . The third years had never had so much homework . [Neville Longbottom]168-neville seemed close to a nervous collapse , and [he]168-neville was n’t [the only one]2049-the only one .

[Slytherin]209-gryffindor was leading the tournament by exactly two hundred points . [The whole of [Gryffindor House]51-gryffindor house]2056-the whole of gryffindor house was obsessed with the coming match . [Harry]117-harry was having a particularly bad time of it . [Harry]117-harry slept badly . First [he]117-harry dreamed that [he]117-harry had overslept , and that [Wood]247-wood was yelling , “ Where were [you]117-harry ? [The grounds]2927-the grounds were still and quiet . No breath of wind disturbed the treetops in [the Forbidden Forest]62-the forbidden forest ; [the Whomping Willow]3272-the whomping willow was motionless and innocent - looking . It looked as though the conditions for the match would be perfect .

[Harry]117-harry set down [his]117-harry goblet and was about to turn back to [his]117-harry bed when something caught [his]117-harry eye . [An animal of some kind]2077-an animal of some kind was prowling across [the silvery lawn]2078-the silvery lawn .

[Harry]117-harry dashed to [his]117-harry bedside table , snatched up [his]117-harry glasses , and put them on , then hurried back to the window . It could n’t be the Grim — not now — not right before the match —

Or was it only [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks ? [Harry]117-harry squinted , pressing [his]117-harry nose flat against the glass . [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks seemed to have come to a halt . [Harry]117-harry was sure [he]117-harry could see something else moving in the shadow of the trees too .

And just then , it emerged — a gigantic , shaggy black dog , moving stealthily across [the lawn]1647-the lawn , [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks trotting at its side . [Harry]117-harry stared . “ [Ron]147-ron ! ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry hissed . “ [Ron]147-ron ! Wake up ! ”[117-harry]

“ Down here — ”[117-harry]

[Harry]117-harry looked quickly back out of the window .

[Crookshanks]251-crookshanks and the dog had vanished . [Harry]117-harry climbed onto the windowsill to look right down into the shadows of [the castle]807-the castle , but they were n’t [there]486-there . Where had [they]2085-they gone ?

A loud snore told [him]117-harry [Ron]147-ron had fallen asleep again .

[Harry]117-harry and [the rest of [the Gryffindor team]1387-the gryffindor team]2086-the rest of the gryffindor team entered [the Great Hall]947-the great hall the next day to enormous applause . [Harry]117-harry could n’t help grinning broadly as [he]117-harry saw that both the Ravenclaw and Hufflepuff tables were applauding [them]2085-they too . [Wood]247-wood spent the whole of breakfast urging [[his]247-wood team]1390-his team to eat , while touching nothing [himself]247-wood . Then [he]247-wood hurried [them]2085-they off to [the field]1263-the field before [anyone else]3228-anyone else had finished , so [they]2085-they could get an idea of the conditions . As [they]2085-they left [the Great Hall]947-the great hall , [everyone]769-everyone applauded again .

“ Good luck , [Harry]117-harry ! ”[324-cho] called [Cho]324-cho . [Harry]117-harry felt [himself]117-harry blushing .

“ Okay — no wind to speak of — sun ’s a bit bright , that could impair [your]117-harry vision , watch out for it — ground ’s fairly hard , good , that ’ll give [us]2085-they a fast kickoff — ”[117-harry]

[Wood]247-wood paced [the field]1263-the field , staring around with [the team]3128-the team behind [him]247-wood . [Harry]117-harry , who had almost pelted headlong into the stands , skidded to a halt in midair , reversed , and zoomed back into the middle of [the field]1263-the field .

Then [Wood]247-wood was speeding toward [him]117-harry , half - blinded by tears ; [he]247-wood seized [Harry]117-harry around the neck and sobbed unrestrainedly into [his]117-harry shoulder . Wait till [I]305-hagrid tell [Buckbeak]233-buckbeak ! ”[305-hagrid] There was [Percy]143-percy , jumping up and down like [a maniac]3657-a maniac , all dignity forgotten . [Professor McGonagall]199-professor mcgonagall was sobbing harder even than [Wood]247-wood , wiping [her]199-professor mcgonagall eyes with an enormous Gryffindor flag ; and there , fighting [their]2157-them way toward [Harry]117-harry , were [Ron]147-ron and [Hermione]313-hermione . If only there had been [a dementor around ... As a sobbing Wood]2158-a dementor around ... as a sobbing wood passed [Harry]117-harry the Cup , as [he]117-harry lifted it into the air , [Harry]117-harry felt [he]117-harry could have produced [the world ’s best Patronus]2159-the world ’s best patronus .

[Harry]117-harry ’s euphoria at finally winning the Quidditch Cup lasted at least a week . Even the weather seemed to be celebrating ; as June approached , the days became cloudless and sultry , and all [anybody]1148-anybody felt like doing was strolling onto [the grounds]2927-the grounds and flopping down on the grass with several pints of iced pumpkin juice , perhaps playing a casual game of Gobstones or watching the giant squid propel itself dreamily across [the surface of [the lake]921-the lake]2162-the surface of the lake .

But [they]2157-them could n’t . Exams were nearly upon [them]2157-them , and instead of lazing around outside , [the students]980-the students were forced to remain inside [the castle]807-the castle , trying to bully [their]980-the students brains into concentrating while enticing wafts of summer air drifted in through the windows . Even [Fred]144-fred and [George Weasley]145-george had been spotted working ; [they]980-the students were about to take [their]980-the students O.W.L.s ( Ordinary Wizarding Levels ) . [Percy]143-percy was getting ready to take [his]143-percy N.E.W.T.s ( Nastily Exhausting Wizarding Tests ) , the highest qualification [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts offered . As [Percy]143-percy hoped to enter [the Ministry of Magic]437-the ministry of magic , [he]143-percy needed top grades . [He]143-percy was becoming increasingly edgy , and gave very severe punishments to [anybody who disturbed the quiet of [the common room]1008-the common room in the evenings]2167-anybody who disturbed the quiet of the common room in the evenings . In fact , [the only person who seemed more anxious than [Percy]143-percy]2169-the only person who seemed more anxious than percy was [Hermione]313-hermione .

[Harry]117-harry and [Ron]147-ron had given up asking [her]313-hermione how [she]313-hermione was managing to attend several classes at once , but [they]980-the students could n’t restrain [themselves]980-the students when [they]980-the students saw the exam schedule [she]313-hermione had drawn up for [herself]313-hermione . The first column read :

Monday :

9 o'clock , Arithmancy .

9 o'clock , Transfiguration .

Lunch :

1 o'clock , Charms .

1 o'clock , Ancient Runes .

“ [Hermione]313-hermione ? ”[147-ron] [Ron]147-ron said cautiously , because [she]313-hermione was liable to explode when interrupted these days . “ Er — are [you]313-hermione sure [you]313-hermione ’ve copied down these times right ? ”[313-hermione]

“ What ? ”[313-hermione] snapped [Hermione]313-hermione , picking up the exam schedule and examining it . “ Yes , of course [I]313-hermione have . ”[313-hermione]

“ Is there any point asking how [you]313-hermione ’re going to sit for two exams at once ? ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry .

“ No , ”[313-hermione] said [Hermione]313-hermione shortly . “ Have either of [you]313-hermione seen [my]313-hermione copy of Numerology and Grammatica ? ”[313-hermione]

“ Oh , yeah , [I]147-ron borrowed it for a bit of bedtime reading , ”[147-ron] said [Ron]147-ron , but very quietly . [Hermione]313-hermione started shifting heaps of parchment around on [her]313-hermione table , looking for the book . Just then , there was a rustle at the window and [Hedwig]130-hedwig fluttered through it , a note clutched tight in [her]130-hedwig beak .

“ It ’s from [Hagrid]305-hagrid , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , ripping the note open . “ [Buckbeak]233-buckbeak ’s appeal — it ’s set for the sixth . ”[117-harry]

“ That ’s the day [we]3784-we finish [our]3784-we exams , ”[313-hermione] said [Hermione]313-hermione , still looking everywhere for [her]313-hermione Arithmancy book .

“ And [they]3785-they ’re coming up here to do it , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , still reading from the letter . “ Someone from [the Ministry of Magic]437-the ministry of magic and — and [an executioner]3787-an executioner . ”[117-harry]

[Hermione]313-hermione looked up , startled .

“ [They]3785-they ’re bringing [the executioner]3788-the executioner to the appeal ! But that sounds as though [they]3785-they ’ve already decided ! ”[313-hermione]

“ Yeah , it does , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry slowly .

“ [They]3785-they ca n’t ! ”[147-ron] [Ron]147-ron howled . “ [I]147-ron ’ve spent ages reading up on stuff for [him]306-malfoy ; [they]3785-they ca n’t just ignore it all ! ”[147-ron]

But [Harry]117-harry had a horrible feeling that [the Committee for the Disposal of [Dangerous Creatures]310-dangerous creatures]1657-the committee for the disposal of dangerous creatures had had its mind made up for it by [Mr. Malfoy]306-malfoy . [Draco]200-malfoy , who had been noticeably subdued since [Gryffindor]250-gryffindor ’s triumph in the Quidditch final , seemed to regain some of [his]200-malfoy old swagger over the next few days . From sneering comments [Harry]117-harry overheard , [Malfoy]200-malfoy was certain [Buckbeak]233-buckbeak was going to be killed , and seemed thoroughly pleased with [himself]200-malfoy for bringing it about . It was all [Harry]117-harry could do to stop [himself]117-harry imitating [Hermione]313-hermione and hitting [Malfoy]200-malfoy in the face on these occasions . And the worst thing of all was that [they]2171-they had no time or opportunity to go and see [Hagrid]305-hagrid , because the strict new security measures had not been lifted , and [Harry]117-harry did n’t dare retrieve [his]117-harry Invisibility Cloak from below [the one - eyed witch]1546-the one - eyed witch .

Exam week began and an unnatural hush fell over [the castle]807-the castle . The third years emerged from Transfiguration at lunchtime on Monday , limp and ashen - faced , comparing results and bemoaning the difficulty of the tasks [they]2171-they had been set , which had included turning a teapot into a tortoise . [Hermione]313-hermione irritated [the rest]842-the rest by fussing about how [her]313-hermione tortoise had looked more like a turtle , which was the least of [everyone else]487-everyone else ’s worries .

“ Mine still had a spout for a tail , what a nightmare ... ”[313-hermione]

“ Were the tortoises supposed to breathe steam ? ”[313-hermione]

“ It still had a willow - patterned shell , [d’you]3789-d’you think that ’ll count against [me]313-hermione ? ”[313-hermione]

Then , after a hasty lunch , it was straight back [upstairs]505-upstairs for the Charms exam . [Hermione]313-hermione had been right ; [Professor Flitwick]208-professor flitwick did indeed test [them]2171-they on [Cheering Charms]337-cheering charms . [Harry]117-harry slightly overdid [his]117-harry out of nerves and [Ron]147-ron , who was partnering [him]117-harry , ended up in fits of hysterical laughter and had to be led away to [a quiet room]2177-a quiet room for an hour before [he]147-ron was ready to perform the charm [himself]147-ron . After dinner , [the students]980-the students hurried back to [[their]980-the students common rooms]2179-their common rooms , not to relax , but to start studying for Care of Magical Creatures , Potions , and Astronomy .

[Hagrid]305-hagrid presided over the Care of Magical Creatures exam the following morning with a very preoccupied air indeed ; [his]305-hagrid heart did n’t seem to be in it at all . [He]305-hagrid had provided a large tub of fresh flobberworms for [the class]1047-the class , and told [them]1047-the class that to pass the test , [their]1047-the class flobberworm had to still be alive at the end of one hour . As flobberworms flourished best if left to [their]2181-their own devices , it was the easiest exam any of [them]1047-the class had ever taken , and also gave [Harry]117-harry , [Ron]147-ron , and [Hermione]313-hermione plenty of opportunity to speak to [Hagrid]305-hagrid .

“ [Beaky]336-beaky ’s gettin ’ a bit depressed , ”[305-hagrid] [Hagrid]305-hagrid told [them]1047-the class , bending low on the pretense of checking that [Harry]117-harry ’s flobberworm was still alive . “ [Bin]330-bin cooped up too long . [They]1047-the class had Potions that afternoon , which was an unqualified disaster . Try as [Harry]117-harry might , [he]117-harry could n’t get [his]117-harry Confusing Concoction to thicken , and [Snape]260-snape , standing watch with an air of vindictive pleasure , scribbled something that looked suspiciously like a zero onto [his]260-snape notes before moving away .

Then came Astronomy at midnight , up on [the tallest tower]2182-the tallest tower ; History of Magic on Wednesday morning , in which [Harry]117-harry scribbled everything [Florean Fortescue]180-florean fortescue had ever told [him]117-harry about medieval witch - hunts , while wishing [he]117-harry could have had one of [Fortescue]180-florean fortescue ’s choco - nut sundaes with [him]117-harry in [the stifling classroom]2183-the stifling classroom . [Their]1047-the class second to last exam , on Thursday morning , was Defense Against the Dark Arts . [Professor Lupin]195-lupin had compiled the most unusual exam any of [them]1047-the class had ever taken : a sort of obstacle course outside in the sun , where [they]1047-the class had to wade across [a deep paddling pool containing a grindylow]2186-a deep paddling pool containing a grindylow , cross a series of potholes full of Red Caps , squish [their]1047-the class way across [a patch of marsh]2187-a patch of marsh while ignoring misleading directions from a hinkypunk , then climb into an old trunk and battle with a new boggart .

“ Excellent , [Harry]117-harry , ”[195-lupin] [Lupin]195-lupin muttered as [Harry]117-harry climbed out of the trunk , grinning . “ Full marks . ”[117-harry]

[Harry]117-harry climbed back down the ladder and [the spiral staircase]1420-the spiral staircase , wondering ... had [he]117-harry just heard [Professor Trelawney]219-professor trelawney make a real prediction ? Or had that been [her]219-professor trelawney idea of an impressive end to the test ?

Five minutes later [he]117-harry was dashing past [the security trolls outside the entrance to [Gryffindor Tower]56-gryffindor tower]2225-the security trolls outside the entrance to gryffindor tower , [Professor Trelawney]219-professor trelawney ’s words still resounding in [his]117-harry head . “ [Professor Trelawney]219-professor trelawney , ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry panted , “ just told [me]117-harry — ”[117-harry]

[Harry]117-harry reached for [his]117-harry wand , but too late — the dog had made an enormous leap and the front paws hit [him]147-ron on the chest ; [he]147-ron keeled over backward in a whirl of hair ; [he]117-harry felt its hot breath , saw inch - long teeth —

But the force of its leap had carried it too far ; it rolled off [him]147-ron . Dazed , feeling as though [his]117-harry ribs were broken , [Harry]117-harry tried to stand up ; [he]117-harry could hear it growling as it skidded around for a new attack .

[Ron]147-ron was on [his]147-ron feet . “ [Lumos]286-lumos ! ”[117-harry] [he]117-harry whispered .

“ [Ron]147-ron ! ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry shouted , trying to follow , but a heavy branch whipped lethally through the air and [he]117-harry was forced backward again .

All [they]2271-they could see now was one of [Ron]147-ron ’s legs , which [he]147-ron had hooked around a root in an effort to stop the dog from pulling [him]147-ron farther underground — but a horrible crack cut the air like a gunshot ; [Ron]147-ron ’s leg had broken , and a moment later , [his]147-ron foot vanished from sight .

“ [Harry]117-harry — [we]2271-they ’ve got to go for help — ”[313-hermione] [Hermione]313-hermione gasped ; [she]313-hermione was bleeding too ; [the Willow]277-the willow had cut [her]313-hermione across the shoulder .

“ No ! That thing ’s big enough to eat [him]147-ron ; [we]2271-they have n’t got time — ”[277-the willow]

“ [We]2271-they ’re never going to get through without help — ”[277-the willow]

“ If that dog can get in , [we]2271-they can , ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry panted , darting here and there , trying to find a way through the vicious , swishing branches , but [he]117-harry could n’t get an inch nearer to the tree roots without being in range of the tree ’s blows .

“ Oh , help , help , ”[313-hermione] [Hermione]313-hermione whispered frantically , dancing uncertainly on the spot , “ please ... ”[313-hermione]

[Crookshanks]251-crookshanks darted forward . [He]251-crookshanks slithered between the battering branches like a snake and placed [his]251-crookshanks front paws upon a knot on the trunk .

Abruptly , as though the tree had been turned to marble , it stopped moving . Not a leaf twitched or shook .

“ [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks ! ”[313-hermione] [Hermione]313-hermione whispered uncertainly . [She]313-hermione now grasped [Harry]117-harry ’s arm painfully hard . “ How did [he]251-crookshanks know — ? ”[313-hermione]

“ [He]251-crookshanks ’s friends with that dog , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry grimly . “ [I]117-harry ’ve seen [them]2271-they together . Come on — and keep [your]117-harry wand out — ”[117-harry]

[They]2271-they covered the distance to the trunk in seconds , but before [they]2271-they had reached the gap in the roots , [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks had slid into it with a flick of [his]251-crookshanks bottlebrush tail . [Harry]117-harry went next ; [he]117-harry crawled forward , headfirst , and slid down an earthy slope to the bottom of [a very low tunnel]2272-a very low tunnel . [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks was a little way along , [his]251-crookshanks eyes flashing in the light from [Harry]117-harry ’s wand . Seconds later , [Hermione]313-hermione slithered down beside [him]117-harry .

“ Where ’s [Ron]147-ron ? ”[313-hermione] [she]313-hermione whispered in a terrified voice .

“ This way , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , setting off , bent - backed , after [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks .

“ Where does [this tunnel]3839-this tunnel come out ? ”[313-hermione] [Hermione]313-hermione asked breathlessly from behind [him]117-harry .

“ [I]2273-they do n’t know ... It ’s marked on the [Marauder]281-the marauder ’s Map but [Fred]144-fred and [George]145-george said [no one]2805-no one ’s ever gotten into it ... It goes off the edge of the map , but it looked like it ends up in [Hogsmeade]16-hogsmeade ... ”[2273-they]

[They]2273-they moved as fast as [they]2273-they could , bent almost double ; ahead of [them]2273-they , [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks ’s tail bobbed in and out of view . On and on went [the passage]775-the passage ; it felt at least as long as the one to [Honeydukes]49-honeydukes ... All [Harry]117-harry could think of was [Ron]147-ron and what the enormous dog might be doing to [him]117-harry ... [He]117-harry was drawing breath in sharp , painful gasps , running at a crouch ...

And then [the tunnel]1613-the tunnel began to rise ; moments later it twisted , and [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks had gone . Instead , [Harry]117-harry could see a patch of dim light through a small opening .

[He]117-harry and [Hermione]313-hermione paused , gasping for breath , edging forward . [Both]2276-both raised [their]2276-both wands to see what lay beyond .

It was [a room]1568-a room , [a very disordered , dusty room]2278-a very disordered , dusty room . Paper was peeling from the walls ; there were stains all over the floor ; every piece of furniture was broken as though [somebody]711-somebody had smashed it . The windows were all boarded up .

[Harry]117-harry glanced at [Hermione]313-hermione , who looked very frightened but nodded .

[Harry]117-harry pulled [himself]117-harry out of the hole , staring around . [The room]404-the room was deserted , but a door to [their]2276-both right stood open , leading to [a shadowy hallway]2281-a shadowy hallway . [Hermione]313-hermione suddenly grabbed [Harry]117-harry ’s arm again . [Her]313-hermione wide eyes were traveling around the boarded windows .

“ [Harry]117-harry , ”[313-hermione] [she]313-hermione whispered , “ [I]313-hermione think [we]2276-both ’re in [the Shrieking Shack]3345-the shrieking shack . ”[313-hermione]

[Harry]117-harry looked around . [His]117-harry eyes fell on a wooden chair near [them]2276-both . Large chunks had been torn out of it ; one of the legs had been ripped off entirely .

“ [Ghosts]356-ghosts did n’t do that , ”[117-harry] [he]117-harry said slowly .

At that moment , there was a creak overhead . Something had moved [upstairs]505-upstairs . [Both of [them]726-both of them]726-both of them looked up at the ceiling . [Hermione]313-hermione ’s grip on [Harry]117-harry ’s arm was so tight [he]117-harry was losing feeling in [his]117-harry fingers . [He]117-harry raised [his]117-harry eyebrows at [her]313-hermione ; [she]313-hermione nodded again and let go .

Quietly as [they]726-both of them could , [they]726-both of them crept out into [the hall]522-the hall and up the crumbling staircase . Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust except the floor , where a wide shiny stripe had been made by something being dragged [upstairs]505-upstairs .

[They]726-both of them reached [the dark landing]2286-the dark landing .

“ Nox , ”[726-both of them] [they]726-both of them whispered together , and the lights at the end of [their]726-both of them wands went out . Only one door was open . As [they]726-both of them crept toward [it]2287-it , [they]726-both of them heard movement from behind [it]2287-it ; a low moan , and then a deep , loud purring . [They]726-both of them exchanged a last look , a last nod .

Wand held tightly before [him]117-harry , [Harry]117-harry kicked the door wide open .

On a magnificent four - poster bed with dusty hangings lay [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks , purring loudly at the sight of them . On the floor beside [him]117-harry , clutching [his]117-harry leg , which stuck out at a strange angle , was [Ron]147-ron .

[Harry]117-harry and [Hermione]313-hermione dashed across to [him]117-harry .

“ [Ron]147-ron — are [you]147-ron okay ? ”[117-harry]

“ What — ”[117-harry]

“ [He]147-ron ’s the dog ... [he]147-ron ’s [an Animagus]3842-an animagus ... ”[147-ron]

[Ron]147-ron was staring over [Harry]117-harry ’s shoulder . [Harry]117-harry wheeled around . With a snap , [the man in the shadows]2288-the man in the shadows closed the door behind [them]2289-them .

A mass of filthy , matted hair hung to [his]117-harry elbows . If eyes had n’t been shining out of the deep , dark sockets , [he]117-harry might have been a corpse . The waxy skin was stretched so tightly over the bones of [his]117-harry face , it looked like a skull . [His]117-harry yellow teeth were bared in a grin . It was [Sirius Black]152-black .

“ Expelliarmus ! ”[117-harry] [he]117-harry croaked , pointing [Ron]147-ron ’s wand at [them]2289-them .

“ [I]117-harry thought [you]117-harry ’d come and help [[your]117-harry friend]3676-your friend , ”[117-harry] [he]117-harry said hoarsely . The taunt about [[his]117-harry father]565-his father rang in [Harry]117-harry ’s ears as though [Black]152-black had bellowed it . A boiling hate erupted in [Harry]117-harry ’s chest , leaving no place for fear . “ Going to kill [me]117-harry , [Harry]117-harry ? ”[117-harry] [he]117-harry whispered .

And then came a new sound —

[Harry]117-harry stood there , feeling suddenly empty . [He]117-harry had n’t done it . [His]117-harry nerve had failed [him]117-harry . [Black]152-black was going to be handed back to [the dementors]2939-the dementors .

Then [Lupin]195-lupin spoke in an odd voice , a voice that shook with some suppressed emotion .

[Ron]147-ron made a valiant effort to get up again but fell back with a whimper of pain . [Lupin]195-lupin made toward [him]147-ron , looking concerned , but [Ron]147-ron gasped ,

“ Get away from [me]147-ron , [werewolf]3864-werewolf ! ”[147-ron]

[Lupin]195-lupin stopped dead . Then , with an obvious effort , [he]195-lupin turned to [Hermione]313-hermione and said , “ How long have [you]313-hermione known ? ”[195-lupin]

“ Ages , ”[313-hermione] [Hermione]313-hermione whispered . “ Since [I]313-hermione did [Professor Snape]260-snape ’s essay ... ”[313-hermione]

“ [He]260-snape ’ll be delighted , ”[195-lupin] said [Lupin]195-lupin coolly . “ [He]260-snape assigned that essay hoping [someone]572-someone would realize what [my]195-lupin symptoms meant ... Did [you]195-lupin check the lunar chart and realize that [I]195-lupin was always ill at the full moon ? “ Both , ”[313-hermione] [Hermione]313-hermione said quietly .

“ [[My]117-harry dad]3531-my dad too ? ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry , astounded .

“ But how did that help [you]117-harry ? ”[313-hermione] said [Hermione]313-hermione , sounding puzzled .

“ [They]2324-my three friends could n’t keep [me]195-lupin company as [humans]3924-humans , so [they]2324-my three friends kept [me]195-lupin company as animals , ”[195-lupin] said [Lupin]195-lupin . “ [A werewolf]3861-a werewolf is only a danger to [people]2759-people . “ Hurry up , [Remus]358-remus , ”[152-black] snarled [Black]152-black , who was still watching [Scabbers]185-scabbers with a horrible sort of hunger on [his]152-black face .

“ [I]195-lupin ’m getting [there]486-there , [Sirius]152-black , [I]195-lupin ’m getting [there]486-there ... well , highly exciting possibilities were open to [us]3941-we now that [we]3941-we could all transform . [Sirius]152-black and [James]132-james transformed into such large animals , [they]2324-my three friends were able to keep [a werewolf]3861-a werewolf in check . And that ’s how [we]3941-we came to write the Marauder ’s Map , and sign it with [our]3941-we nicknames . [Sirius]152-black is [Padfoot]285-padfoot . [Peter]297-pettigrew is [Wormtail]284-wormtail . [James]132-james was Prongs . ”[195-lupin]

“ What sort of animal — ? ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry began , but [Hermione]313-hermione cut [him]117-harry off .

“ That was still really dangerous ! Running around in the dark with [a werewolf]3861-a werewolf ! What if [you]195-lupin ’d given [the others]841-the others the slip , and bitten [somebody]711-somebody ? ”[313-hermione]

“ A thought that still haunts [me]195-lupin , ”[195-lupin] said [Lupin]195-lupin heavily . “ And there were near misses , many of them . [We]3950-we laughed about [them]3951-them afterwards . [We]3950-we were young , thoughtless — carried away with [our]3950-we own cleverness .[195-lupin]

[I]0-i sometimes felt guilty about betraying [Dumbledore]191-dumbledore ’s trust , of course ... [Lupin]195-lupin ’s face had hardened , and there was self - disgust in [his]195-lupin voice : “ All this year , [I]195-lupin have been battling with [myself]195-lupin , wondering whether [I]195-lupin should tell [Dumbledore]191-dumbledore that [Sirius]152-black was [an Animagus]3842-an animagus . “ It was as if [someone]572-someone had lit a fire in [my]2344-i head , and [the dementors]2939-the dementors could n’t destroy it ... It was n’t a happy feeling ... it was an obsession ... but it gave [me]2344-i strength , it cleared [my]2344-i mind . [I]2344-i ’ve been living in [the forest]1095-the forest ever since , except when [I]2344-i came to watch [the Quidditch]274-quidditch , of course . [Sirius]152-black turned right around to look at [him]117-harry ; [Snape]260-snape ’s head was scraping the ceiling but [Sirius]152-black did n’t seem to care .

[Sirius]152-black ’s gaunt face broke into the first true smile [Harry]117-harry had seen upon it . [They]2361-they did not speak again until [they]2361-they had reached the end of [the tunnel]1613-the tunnel . [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks darted up first ; [he]251-crookshanks had evidently pressed [his]251-crookshanks paw to the knot on the trunk , because [Lupin]195-lupin , [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew , and [Ron]147-ron clambered upward without any sound of savaging branches .

[Sirius]152-black saw [Snape]260-snape up through the hole , then stood back for [Harry]117-harry and [Hermione]313-hermione to pass . At last , all of [them]2361-they were out .

[The grounds]2927-the grounds were very dark now ; the only light came from the distant windows of [the castle]807-the castle . Without a word , [they]2361-they set off . [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew was still wheezing and occasionally whimpering . [Harry]117-harry ’s mind was buzzing . [He]117-harry was going to leave [the Dursleys]122-the dursleys . [He]117-harry was going to live with [Sirius Black]152-black , [[[his]117-harry parents]550-his parents ’ best friend]2366-his parents ’ best friend ... [He]117-harry felt dazed ... “ One wrong move , [Peter]297-pettigrew , ”[195-lupin] said [Lupin]195-lupin threateningly ahead . [His]195-lupin wand was still pointed sideways at [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew ’s chest .

Silently [they]2361-they tramped through [the grounds]2927-the grounds , the castle lights growing slowly larger . [Snape]260-snape was still drifting weirdly ahead of [Sirius]152-black , [his]260-snape chin bumping on [his]260-snape chest . And then —

A cloud shifted . There were suddenly dim shadows on the ground . [[Their]2361-they party]2369-their party was bathed in moonlight .

[Snape]260-snape collided with [Lupin]195-lupin , [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew , and [Ron]147-ron , who had stopped abruptly . [Sirius]152-black froze . [He]152-black flung out one arm to make [Harry]117-harry and [Hermione]313-hermione stop .

[Harry]117-harry could see [Lupin]195-lupin ’s silhouette . [He]195-lupin had gone rigid . Then [his]195-lupin limbs began to shake .

“ Oh , [my]313-hermione — ”[313-hermione] [Hermione]313-hermione gasped . “ [He]195-lupin did n’t take [his]195-lupin potion tonight ! [He]195-lupin ’s not safe ! ”[313-hermione]

“ Run , ”[152-black] [Sirius]152-black whispered . “ Run . Now . ”[152-black]

But [Harry]117-harry could n’t run . [Ron]147-ron was chained to [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew and [Lupin]195-lupin . [He]147-ron leapt forward but [Sirius]152-black caught [him]147-ron around the chest and threw [him]147-ron back .

“ Leave it to [me]152-black — RUN ! ”[152-black]

There was a terrible snarling noise . [Lupin]195-lupin ’s head was lengthening . So was [his]195-lupin body . [His]195-lupin shoulders were hunching . As the werewolf reared , snapping its long jaws , [Sirius]152-black disappeared from [Harry]117-harry ’s side . [He]152-black had transformed . [The enormous , bearlike dog]2370-the enormous , bearlike dog bounded forward . [They]2371-they were locked , jaw to jaw , claws ripping at each other —

[Harry]117-harry stood , transfixed by the sight , too intent upon the battle to notice anything else . It was [Hermione]313-hermione ’s scream that alerted [him]117-harry —

[Pettigrew]297-pettigrew had dived for [Lupin]195-lupin ’s dropped wand . [Ron]147-ron , unsteady on [his]147-ron bandaged leg , fell . There was a bang , a burst of light — and [Ron]147-ron lay motionless on the ground . Another bang — [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks flew into the air and back to [the earth]2372-the earth in a heap .

“ Expelliarmus ! ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry yelled , pointing [his]117-harry own wand at [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew ; [Lupin]195-lupin ’s wand flew high into the air and out of sight . “ Stay where [you]297-pettigrew are ! ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry shouted , running forward .

“ [Sirius]152-black , [he]152-black ’s gone , [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew transformed ! ”[117-harry] [Harry]117-harry yelled .

“ [We]2445-they — er — have to read [you]305-hagrid the official notice of execution , [Hagrid]305-hagrid . [I]355-macnair ’ll make it quick . “ [I]117-harry ’m not going to try and interfere , ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry quickly . “ But if [we]4258-we do n’t see what ’s going on , how ’re [we]4258-we going to know when it ’s time to rescue [Sirius]152-black ? ”[117-harry]

“ Well ... okay , then ... [I]313-hermione ’ll wait here with [Buckbeak]233-buckbeak ... but [Harry]117-harry , be careful — there ’s a werewolf out there — and [the dementors]2939-the dementors — ”[313-hermione]

[Harry]117-harry stepped outside again and edged around [the cabin]1650-the cabin . [He]117-harry could hear yelping in the distance . “ [You]210-dumbledore think [the dead [we]4356-we have loved]4355-the dead we have loved ever truly leave [us]4356-we ? And [Dumbledore]210-dumbledore left [the office]2009-the office , leaving [Harry]117-harry to [his]117-harry very confused thoughts .

[Nobody at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts]2592-nobody at hogwarts knew the truth of what had happened the night that [Sirius]152-black , [Buckbeak]233-buckbeak , and [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew had vanished except [Harry]117-harry , [Ron]147-ron , [Hermione]313-hermione , and [Professor Dumbledore]210-dumbledore . As the end of term approached , [Harry]117-harry heard many different theories about what had really happened , but none of them came close to the truth .

[Malfoy]306-malfoy was furious about [Buckbeak]233-buckbeak . [He]306-malfoy was convinced that [Hagrid]305-hagrid had found a way of smuggling [the hippogriff]1116-the hippogriff to safety , and seemed outraged that [he]305-hagrid and [[his]305-hagrid father]565-his father had been outwitted by [a gamekeeper]2595-a gamekeeper . [Percy Weasley]143-percy , meanwhile , had much to say on the subject of [Sirius]152-black ’s escape .

“ If [I]143-percy manage to get into [the Ministry]44-the ministry , [I]143-percy ’ll have a lot of proposals to make about [Magical Law Enforcement]113-magical law enforcement ! ”[143-percy] [he]143-percy told [the only person who would listen]2596-the only person who would listen — [[his]143-percy girlfriend]2850-his girlfriend , [Penelope]193-penelope .

Though the weather was perfect , though the atmosphere was so cheerful , though [he]143-percy knew [they]2598-they had achieved the near impossible in helping [Sirius]152-black to freedom , [Harry]117-harry had never approached the end of a school year in worse spirits .

[He]117-harry certainly was n’t [the only one who was sorry to see [Professor Lupin]195-lupin]2599-the only one who was sorry to see professor lupin go . The whole of [Harry]117-harry ’s Defense Against [the Dark Arts class]2600-the dark arts class was miserable about [his]117-harry resignation .

“ Wonder what [they]2598-they ’ll give [us]2598-they next year ? ”[184-seamus finnigan] said [Seamus Finnigan]184-seamus finnigan gloomily .

“ Maybe [a vampire]610-a vampire , ”[178-tom] suggested [Dean Thomas]178-tom hopefully .

It was n’t only [Professor Lupin]195-lupin ’s departure that was weighing on [Harry]117-harry ’s mind . [He]117-harry could n’t help thinking a lot about [Professor Trelawney]219-professor trelawney ’s prediction . [He]117-harry kept wondering where [Pettigrew]297-pettigrew was now , whether [he]297-pettigrew had sought sanctuary with [Voldemort]133-voldemort yet . But the thing that was lowering [Harry]117-harry ’s spirits most of all was the prospect of returning to [the Dursleys]122-the dursleys . For maybe half an hour , a glorious half hour , [he]117-harry had believed [he]117-harry would be living with [Sirius]152-black from now on ... [[[his]117-harry parents]550-his parents ’ best friend]2366-his parents ’ best friend ... It would have been the next best thing to having [[his]117-harry own father]2603-his own father back . And while no news of [Sirius]152-black was definitely good news , because it meant [he]117-harry had successfully gone into hiding , [Harry]117-harry could n’t help feeling miserable when [he]117-harry thought of [the home [he]117-harry might have had]2604-the home he might have had , and the fact that it was now impossible .

The exam results came out on the last day of term . [Harry]117-harry , [Ron]147-ron , and [Hermione]313-hermione had passed every subject . [Harry]117-harry was amazed that [he]117-harry had got through Potions . [He]117-harry had a shrewd suspicion that [Dumbledore]210-dumbledore might have stepped in to stop [Snape]260-snape failing [him]117-harry on purpose . [Snape]260-snape ’s behavior toward [Harry]117-harry over the past week had been quite alarming . [Harry]117-harry would n’t have thought it possible that [Snape]260-snape ’s dislike for [him]117-harry could increase , but it certainly had . A muscle twitched unpleasantly at the corner of [Snape]260-snape ’s thin mouth every time [he]260-snape looked at [Harry]117-harry , and [he]260-snape was constantly flexing [his]260-snape fingers , as though itching to place them around [Harry]117-harry ’s throat .

[Percy]143-percy had got [his]143-percy top - grade N.E.W.T.s ; [Fred]144-fred and [George]145-george had scraped a handful of O.W.L.s each . [Gryffindor House]51-gryffindor house , meanwhile , largely thanks to [their]51-gryffindor house spectacular performance in the Quidditch Cup , had won the House Championship for the third year running . This meant that the end of term feast took place amid decorations of scarlet and gold , and that the Gryffindor table was the noisiest of [the lot]2605-the lot , as [everybody]3008-everybody celebrated . [Even Harry]117-harry managed to forget about the journey back to [the Dursleys]122-the dursleys the next day as [he]117-harry ate , drank , talked , and laughed with [the rest]842-the rest .

As [the Hogwarts Express]13-the hogwarts express pulled out of [the station]2658-the station the next morning , [Hermione]313-hermione gave [Harry]117-harry and [Ron]147-ron some surprising news .

“ [I]313-hermione went to see [Professor McGonagall]199-professor mcgonagall this morning , just before breakfast . [I]313-hermione ’ve decided to drop Muggle Studies . ”[313-hermione]

But it was late in the afternoon before the thing that made [him]117-harry truly happy turned up ...

“ [Harry]117-harry , ”[313-hermione] said [Hermione]313-hermione suddenly , peering over [his]117-harry shoulder . “ What ’s that thing outside [your]117-harry window ? ”[313-hermione]

[Harry]117-harry turned to look outside . Something very small and gray was bobbing in and out of sight beyond the glass . [He]117-harry stood up for a better look and saw that it was a tiny owl , carrying a letter that was much too big for it . The owl was so small , in fact , that it kept tumbling over in the air , buffeted this way and that in [the train]794-the train ’s slipstream . [Harry]117-harry quickly pulled down the window , stretched out [his]117-harry arm , and caught it . It felt like a very fluffy Snitch . [He]117-harry brought it carefully inside . [The owl]2612-the owl dropped [its]2612-the owl letter onto [Harry]117-harry ’s seat and began zooming around [[their]2613-their compartment]876-their compartment , apparently very pleased with [itself]2612-the owl for accomplishing its task . [Hedwig]130-hedwig clicked [her]130-hedwig beak with a sort of dignified disapproval . [Crookshanks]251-crookshanks sat up in [his]251-crookshanks seat , following [the owl]2612-the owl with [his]251-crookshanks great yellow eyes . [Ron]147-ron , noticing this , snatched the owl safely out of harm ’s way .

[Harry]117-harry picked up the letter . It was addressed to [him]117-harry . [He]117-harry ripped open the letter , and shouted , “ It ’s from [Sirius]152-black ! ”[117-harry]

“ What ? ”[147-ron] said [Ron]147-ron and [Hermione]313-hermione excitedly . “ Read it aloud ! ”[147-ron]

[Dear Harry]117-harry ,

[I]0-i hope this finds [you]117-harry before [you]117-harry reach [[your]117-harry aunt]466-your aunt and [uncle]398-uncle . [I]0-i do n’t know whether [they]2618-they ’re used to [owl post]2619-owl post .

[Buckbeak]233-buckbeak and [I]0-i are in hiding . [I]0-i wo n’t tell [you]117-harry where , in case this falls into the wrong hands . [I]0-i have some doubt about [the owl]2612-the owl ’s reliability , but [he]2612-the owl is the best [I]0-i could find , and [he]2612-the owl did seem eager for the job .

[I]0-i believe [the dementors]2939-the dementors are still searching for [me]0-i , but [they]2939-the dementors have n’t a hope of finding [me]0-i here . [I]0-i am planning to allow [some Muggles]120-muggles to glimpse [me]0-i soon , a long way from [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts , so that the security on [the castle]807-the castle will be lifted .

There is something [I]0-i never got around to telling [you]117-harry during [our]2623-our brief meeting . It was [I]0-i who sent [you]117-harry the Firebolt .

“ Ha ! ”[313-hermione] said [Hermione]313-hermione triumphantly . “ See ! [I]313-hermione told [you]117-harry it was from [him]2624-he ! ”[313-hermione]

“ Yes , but [he]2624-he had n’t jinxed it , had [he]2624-he ? ”[147-ron] said [Ron]147-ron . “ Ouch ! ”[147-ron]

The tiny owl , now hooting happily in [his]2624-he hand , had nibbled one of [his]2624-he fingers in what it seemed to think was an affectionate way .

[Crookshanks]251-crookshanks took the order to [the Owl Office]2625-the owl office for [me]0-i . [I]0-i used [your]117-harry name but told [them]2626-them to take the gold from [Gringotts]30-gringotts vault number seven hundred and eleven — [my]0-i own . Please consider it as thirteen birthdays ’ worth of presents from [[your]117-harry godfather]4126-your godfather .

[I]0-i would also like to apologize for the fright [I]0-i think [I]0-i gave [you]117-harry that night last year when [you]117-harry left [[[your]117-harry uncle]2628-your uncle ’s house]2629-your uncle ’s house . [I]0-i am enclosing something else for [you]117-harry , which [I]0-i think will make [your]117-harry next year at [Hogwarts]3-hogwarts more enjoyable .

If ever [you]117-harry need [me]0-i , send word . [Your]117-harry owl will find [me]0-i .

[I]0-i ’ll write again soon .

[Sirius]152-black .

[Harry]117-harry looked eagerly inside the envelope . There was another piece of parchment in there . [He]117-harry read it through quickly and felt suddenly as warm and contented as though [he]117-harry ’d swallowed a bottle of hot butterbeer in one gulp .

“ That ’ll be good enough for [Dumbledore]210-dumbledore ! ”[117-harry] said [Harry]117-harry happily . [He]117-harry looked back at [Sirius]152-black ’s letter .

“ Hang on , there ’s a P.S ...[117-harry]

[I]0-i thought [[your]117-harry friend]3676-your friend [Ron]147-ron might like to keep this owl , as it ’s [my]0-i fault [he]147-ron no longer has a rat ” .[0-i]

[Ron]147-ron ’s eyes widened . [The minute owl]2632-the minute owl was still hooting excitedly .
